name: Skullbloom
movement: 30 feet speed, can Dash to pursue
description: The Skullbloom is a plant creature that exhibits ferocity with resilient traits, featuring a fusion of biting and slamming attacks.
memorable: Infects its victims with apocalyptic fungus if both attacks succeed.
goals: To infect humanoids as it pursues them.
relations: May be found in the company of other plant creatures or fungi.
environment: Often resides in damp, dark environments favored by plants and fungi.
strengths: Possesses heightened hearing and resistance to exhaustion and debilitating conditions.
weaknesses: Poor mental attributes limit its effectiveness in clever situations.
attacks: Makes a melee Bite attack dealing piercing and poison damage, and a Slam attack dealing bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Apocalyptic fungus infection when both attacks successfully hit a humanoid.
senses: Has keen hearing, allowing it to perceive sounds within a 10-foot radius.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, utilizing its plant nature to remain hidden.
additional_information: Resistant to the paralyzed, petrified, and unconscious conditions.
Can Dash as a bonus action to chase uninfected targets.
Reflects characteristics of natural resilience in plants.
test_queries: tenacious plant that uses bite and slam attacks
medium plant that pursues prey relentlessly
